headline.main: South Sudan Rejects Report on Leaders’ Wealth

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The government has denounced a report that accuses the leaders on both sides of the country’s civil war of stoking violence to amass illegal wealth....
lead_paragraph: The government has denounced a report that accuses the leaders on both sides of the country’s civil war of stoking violence to amass illegal wealth.
